item.title: How to Build Safari App Extensions
item.description: You can find the Safari App Extension I describe in this blog post on the App Store â€” if you find this blog post valuable, please consider downloading a copy! I previously wrote a little browser extension for Chrome and Safari that reduces Facebook to just the functionality I find useful, by removing the newsfeed and most other things that distract me on the front page. With the most recent update of Safari, however, my extension was automatically turned off everytime I closed the browser.
